response.overview: Ready for a Disney kind of joy? Step aboard the Pixar Pal-A-Round Ferris Wheel in this aerial Point of View ride-along from one of the non-swinging gondolas. Soar above Disney California Adventure® Park and see all the twinkling lights below! With views as bright as Joy's smile and charm straight out of Andy's toy chest, it's a great moment to soak in the Disney joy and Pixar splendor, from every attraction to each shimmering light. As part of the Disneyland® Resort 70th Celebration, this spin in the sky gives you a chance to take a moment and enjoy the view.
response.tagline: Enjoy a moment above Pixar Pier on this spin with a perfect Point of View.
response.title: Pixar Pal-A-Round | Disneyland Resort
